full_summary:
### Data Collection Contract Notice

#### Notice Details

* **Notice Title**: Data Collection
* **Solicitation Number**: NRCan-5000078633
* **Modification Number**: 4
* **Publication Date**: January 26, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 12, 2024 at 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: February 12, 2024

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Type**: Advance Contract Award Notice
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Contracting Entity**: Natural Resources Canada
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Notice Description

The Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) requires the development of an information retrieval system for data collection on new registrations and all vehicles on the road for the next five years (2024 to 2028). The data will focus solely on vehicles in Canada.

The proposed contract term will be from the contract award date to March 31, 2024, with an option to acquire additional services and extend the contract by up to four one-year extensions.

#### Resources

The tender notice can be found on the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website.
